info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Thomas County through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Colby, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Thomas County, including the following locations... Mingo and Halford. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 57 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
